description: A.Weeratunga Vs. S.Ekanayake-Hon. K.T.Chitrasiri,J, Hon. P.W.D.C.Jayathilaka,J before  Revisionary jurisdiction of the Court of Appeal when it comes to challenge a decision made by a Provisional High Court exercising its appellate powers.
